bettertrims.config_not_synced.title: §cKonfig ikke synkronisert
bettertrims.config_not_synced.desc: Du har ikke tillatelse til å endre serverkonfigurasjonen.
bettertrims.config_synced.title: §aKonfig synkronisert
bettertrims.new_config.title: §bNy konfig
bettertrims.new_config.desc: Serverkonfigurasjonen ble oppdatert, fjerner lokale endringer.
bettertrims.effect.rabbit_hide.tooltip: Dyr er ikke redde for deg
bettertrims.yacl.description.game: Settings that affect the game as a whole and are unrelated to any specific effect.
bettertrims.yacl.description.modded: Settings that affect modded trim effects. All effects are per piece of trim and stack additively.
bettertrims.yacl.description.vanilla: Settings that affect vanilla trim effects. All effects are per piece of trim and stack additively.
bettertrims.yacl.description.added_vanil: Settings that affect added vanilla trim effects. All effects are per piece of trim and stack additively.
bettertrims.yacl.description.amethyst.po: The percent chance every second that a positive potion effect will not tick down, or a negative potion effect will tick down twice.
bettertrims.yacl.description.copper.swim: The additional velocity applied to the player when swimming, may not stack with other swim speed increases.
bettertrims.yacl.description.diamond.dam: The percent of damage that is reduced when the player is hit.
bettertrims.yacl.description.emerald.vil: The percent discount that villagers will give you when trading.
bettertrims.yacl.description.iron.mining: The flat increase in mining speed. When wearing 4 trims, a player with haste 2 and a netherite pickaxe with efficiency 5 will mine deepslate instantly.
bettertrims.yacl.description.lapis.encha: Adds this value to the enchantability of the item which improves the chance of getting more, and better enchantments.
bettertrims.yacl.description.netherite.f: The percent of fire damage that is reduced when the player is on fire or in lava. If the reduction is greater than 100%, the player will not take any damage.
bettertrims.yacl.description.quartz.expe: The percent increase in experience gained when picking up experience orbs.
bettertrims.yacl.description.redstone.mo: The percent increase in movement speed when walking, sprinting or flying.
bettertrims.yacl.description.chorus.frui: The percent chance that an attack from an End mob will be dodged, and the player will be teleported a short distance away.
bettertrims.yacl.description.coal.effect: If true, the effect of coal will be disabled to reduce lag. You may wish to do this if you have a lot of furnaces loaded at once.
How many extra times furnaces will process their items per tick. A value of 1 will double the speed, 2 will triple the speed, etc.
The radius in blocks that the furnace will check for players wearing a coal trim. Higher values may cause more lag.
bettertrims.yacl.description.dragon.brea: The radius in blocks that the dragon breath will share potion effects with other entities.
The number of blocks that the vibration effects created by the wearer of an echo shard trim will be reduced by.
bettertrims.yacl.description.enchanted.g: The amount of absorption that will be given to the player when the absorption delay is reached.
The number of ticks between absorption effects being given to the player.
The number of ticks that will be subtracted from the absorption delay per piece of trim. With 4 pieces of trim at the default values, the absorption delay will be 200 ticks (20s).
The maximum amount of absorption that can be given to the player by the trim.
bettertrims.yacl.description.ender.pearl: The percent chance that any damage will be dodged, which will cause the player to teleport a short distance away.
Whether or not the wearer will take damage when in water or rain.
bettertrims.yacl.description.fire.charge: The number of seconds that fire will be applied to the target when struck, or to the attacker when the wearer is attacked.
bettertrims.yacl.description.glowstone.p: The percent chance that a positive potion effect will be amplified when applied to the wearer.
bettertrims.yacl.description.gold.effect: The number of pieces of gold trim that must be worn for piglins to ignore the player.
Whether or not piglins will ignore the player.
bettertrims.yacl.description.leather.ste: The number of additional blocks that the player can step up without jumping (vanilla is 0.6).
bettertrims.yacl.description.nether.bric: Whether or not blazes will ignore the player.
Whether or not piglins will become enraged when the player wears nether brick trim, regardless of whether or not they are wearing gold.
The number of pieces of nether brick trim that must be worn for blazes to ignore the player.
The number of pieces of nether brick trim that must be worn for piglins to become enraged.
The number of pieces of nether brick trim that must be worn for wither skeletons to ignore the player.
Whether or not wither skeletons will ignore the player.
Whether or not guardians will ignore the player.
Whether or not the player will be immune to the mining fatigue effect applied by Elder Guardians.
The number of pieces of prismarine shard trim that must be worn for guardians to ignore the player.
The number of pieces of prismarine shard trim that must be worn for the player to be immune to the mining fatigue effect applied by Elder Guardians.
The percent of fall damage that is reduced when the player lands.
The percent increase in knockback the wearer will receive when attacked.
bettertrims.yacl.description.trim.durabi: The number of times that the trim template can be used before it breaks.
bettertrims.yacl.description.silver.effe: The flat amount of damage that will be added to the wearer's attacks at night.
The flat amount of attack speed that will be added to the wearer's attacks at night.
The percent of damage that is reduced when the wearer is hit at night.
The percent increase in vision that will be granted to the wearer at night.
The percent increase in jump height that will be given to the wearer at night.
The percent increase in movement speed that will be given to the wearer at night.
bettertrims.yacl.description.platinum.ef: Whether or not illagers will ignore the player.
The number of pieces of platinum trim that must be worn for illagers to ignore the player.
bettertrims.yacl.not_installed: Yet Another Config Lib not installed!
bettertrims.yacl.not_installed.desc: Yet Another Config Lib 3 is required to use the in-game config GUI. Would you like to download it now?
bettertrims.yacl.option.coal.effects.dis: Coal - Disable Effect to Reduce Lag
bettertrims.yacl.option.enchanted.golden: Enchanted Golden Apple - Absorption Delay Reduction
bettertrims.yacl.option.gold.effects.pie: Gold - Pieces for Piglins to Ignore
bettertrims.yacl.option.nether.brick.eff: Nether Brick - Pieces for Blazes to Ignore
Nether Brick - Pieces for Piglins to Enrage
Nether Brick - Pieces for Wither Skeletons to Ignore
bettertrims.yacl.option.platinum.effects: Platinum - Pieces for Illagers to Ignore
bettertrims.yacl.option.prismarine.shard: Prismarine Shard - Pieces for Guardians to Ignore
Prismarine Shard - Pieces for Mining Fatigue Immunity
